metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: tif_getimage.c in LibTIFF through 4.0.10, as used in GDAL through 3.0.1 andother products, has an integer overflow that potentially causes aheap-based buffer overflow via a crafted RGBA image, related to a"Negative-size-param" condition.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
